name: pennsylvanian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Pennsylvania: Nearly 35,000 Pennsylvanians are steelworkers. Specter was the first Pennsylvanian to serve four terms in the U.S. Senate.
More examplesFewer examplesHe defended his fellow Pennsylvanian.No Pennsylvanian has come down with rabies since 1984.One of the horses that the 53-year-old Pennsylvanian was training was Kicken Kris.

belonging or relating to the US state of Pennsylvania or its people: I was raised on a Pennsylvanian farm. She is the daughter of a Pennsylvanian Baptist preacher.
More examplesFewer examplesI once read an article about the Pennsylvanian Amish community. A safe house would be a log cabin hidden away in some Pennsylvanian backwater.About 100,000 Pennsylvanian retirees' pensions may be affected by the steel industry's problems.
